data.title: Faculty of Medicine, University of Kelaniya
data.meta_description: Faculty of Medicine at the University of Kelaniya is a leader in medical research and educating the next generation of healthcare professionals.
data.meta_site_name: Faculty of Medicine, University of Kelaniya
